appIsReady.description: You can now scan QR codes even if you have no service. An Internet connection will still be required to validate the rally at the end.
appIsReady.title: The app is ready!

consentToSaveEmail: I want to be informed about the next rallies!
errorCreatingAccount: Error creating account. Is the email already in use?

errors.notAStandist: You don't seem to be a standist. If you are, that means there is an error somewhere. Please contact the staff if that is the case!

loginMagicLinkToast.description: The login link has been sent to your email address. It is valid for one hour.
loginMagicLinkToast.title: Magic link sent successfully

logoutBelow: You can log out by clicking the button below.
mapWillSoonBeAvailable: The map will soon be available!
name: Name
notRedeemedDescription: This submission has not been redeemed yet.

profile.label: Profile
profile.profileUpdated: Your profile has been successfully updated!

socialNetworks.label: Social networks
socialNetworks.subtext: You can empty the fields you don't want displayed on your profile.

profile.title: My profile

rally.1: 12 artists take part in this Rally around VTubers
rally.2: After making a purchase (minimum 2‚Ç¨) from an artist, you can scan a QR code
rally.3: Once you've collected {{minimumStampsCount}} stamps, head over to Sedeto's stand to get a reward!
rally.4: As soon as your submission is validated, enter the draw to win a shikishi from Sedeto!
rally.5: You can replay as many times you like!
rally.6: You can span your rally over several days during the convention!
rules.1: The rally will be completely digital and won't need any 4G, since you loaded it once. The access link will be there and on the booth.
rules.2: The rally features 12 booths. You'll need 10 stamps to complete your card. You'll need to visit the two halls (5 and 6) to complete your rally anyway, so prepare to walk!
rules.3: To get one stamp from a booth, you'll need to make purchases for 2‚Ç¨ or more on said booth.
rules.4: When you completed your rally card, you'll need to reach Sedeto's booth (Hall 6, Q652) to claim your reward. Ask Sedeto's team to validate your card on your smartphone and enter the raffle to draw your price.
rules.5: The main rewards are one of the exclusive postcards made by the featured artists of the rally, representing different popular vtubers, made like a signed original shikishi piece. There are 17 different postcards, you can chose the one you want! Each design will be in limited quantities everyday in order to give chance to everyone.
rules.6: You can win one, two or three of the exclusive postcards in the raffle!
rules.7: We'll draw another big prize at Sedeto's booth everyday at 4PM: One medium shikishi that Sedeto will draw for you with your oshi on it! You'll need to be there and to have validated a card the same day to get a chance to win.
rules.8: You can enter the rally several time to get more rewards!
rules.9: If we encounter any big issues, those rules may change in order to make it work at the best to be enjoyable and fair with everyone.
saveSubmissionQuestion: Do you want to save your submissions?

scanQRDrawer.description: Add a stamp in your collection by scanning the QR code showed to you by the artist!
scanQRDrawer.title: Scan a QR Code
scanQRDrawer.nativeCameraHint: If you're experiencing issues, please try using your device's Camera app to scan the QR code.

scanThisQR: Scan this QR code to get the stamp!
showThisQRCodeToSubmit: Show this QR Code to Sedeto's staff (in Hall 6, Q652) to get your reward!
submitNotAllowed: You have to scan at least {{stamps}} stamps.
submitTerms: This code is valid for the entire duration of the convention, you may get your reward at any day of the convention, if you want to try to get cards that are out-of-stock for the day.

updateTheApp.a11yDescription: You can close the page and open it again to apply changes.
updateTheApp.description: An update was downloaded, please refresh the page to apply it.
updateTheApp.title: Update available

analyticsOptOut.title: Analytics
analyticsOptOut.description: We use Plausible to collect anonymous statistics (number of visitors, number of stamps scanned, etc.). You can opt out here.
analyticsOptOut.optOut: Do not use my data for statistics.

qrCode.title: Registration QR Code
qrCode.scanInstructions: Scan the QR Code to register for the contest. You must have completed the rally to register.
